title: Coordination Sequences of Periodic Structures are Rational via Automata Theory
abstract: We prove the conjecture of Grosse-Kunstleve et al. that coordination sequences of periodic structures in n-dimensional Euclidean space are rational. This has been recently proven by Nakamura et al.; however, our proof is a straightforward application of classic techniques from automata theory.
journal_ref: Acta Crystallographica Section A, Volume78, Issue 2, March 2022
